name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Office Quotes - New Tab, New Quotes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start every search with a short script from the office. Not associated with NBC or NBCâ€™s The Office.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for The Office fanatics! This extension will replace every new tab you open on Chrome with a short script from The Office and a fun The Office themed UI. Not associated with NBC or NBC's The Office.
